WorkflowInfo.Name: Disable root login Linux
WorkflowInfo.Description: Disable root login on Linux mchines
WorkflowInfo.Xoml: <SequentialWorkflowActivity x:Name="CustomWorkflow" xmlns:ns0="clr-namespace:ReadFile;Assembly=ReadFile, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns1="clr-namespace:GetRows;Assembly=GetRows, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns2="clr-namespace:GetCellValue;Assembly=GetCellValue, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns3="clr-namespace:ReturnValue;Assembly=ReturnValue, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns4="clr-namespace:ReplaceString;Assembly=ReplaceString, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns5="clr-namespace:SetCellValue;Assembly=SetCellValue, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns6="clr-namespace:ConvertToPlainText;Assembly=ConvertToPlainText, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns7="clr-namespace:WriteFile;Assembly=WriteFile, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns8="clr-namespace:SendEmail;Assembly=SendEmail, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns9="clr-namespace:Continue;Assembly=Continue, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:x="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml" xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml/workflow" x:Class="WorkflowDesignerControl.CustomWorkflow"> <ns0:ReadFile Password="" HostName="LocalHost" DisplayName="Read File" IsValid="True" HostId="1" Path="/etc/ssh/sshd_config" ReadingDirection="Top" TypeName="ReadFile" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" Description="Read the file in the specified path." TimeInSeconds="0" x:Name="readFile1" LinesToRead="" LineFilter="" UserName="" Timeout="00:01:00" /> <ns1:GetRows RowNumber="" x:Name="getRows1" HostName="{x:Null}" RowContains="PermitRootLogin" ResultSet="%readFile1%" Timeout="00:01:00" IsValid="True" isRowNumber="1" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" DisplayName="Get Rows" ResultSetName="readFile1" TimeInSeconds="0" Description="Gets specified rows from a resultset." HostId="0" TypeName="GetRows" /> <ns2:GetCellValue ColumnType="Number" IsValid="True" x:Name="RowNumber" ColumnNumber="1" ResultSet="%getRows1%" RowNumber="1" ResultSetName="getRows1" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" Description="Gets a specific cell value from a resultset." DisplayName="Get Cell Value" TypeName="GetCellValue" /> <ns2:GetCellValue ColumnType="Number" IsValid="True" x:Name="Line" ColumnNumber="2" ResultSet="%getRows1%" RowNumber="1" ResultSetName="getRows1" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" Description="Gets a specific cell value from a resultset." DisplayName="Get Cell Value" TypeName="GetCellValue" /> <IfElseActivity x:Name="ifElseActivity1"> <IfElseBranchActivity x:Name="ifElseBranchActivity1"> <ns3:ReturnValue Value="yes" IsValid="True" x:Name="returnValue1" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" ConditionName="" UseBranchWhenTimeout="False" UseStoredValue="False" ConditionType="Contains" DisplayName="Return Value" Formula="=Contains("&&&","yes")" Description="Use a returned value of a previous activity." ConditionNumber="-1" UseCustomeCondition="False" Type="UserDefinedValue" TypeName="ReturnValue" /> <ns4:ReplaceString IsValid="True" x:Name="replaceString1" RemoveNewLines="False" FindString="yes" Timeout="00:01:00" ReplaceWithString="no" SourceString="%Line%" IsMatchCase="False" RemoveSpaces="False" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" Description="Find and replace a string with another string" RemoveTabs="False" DisplayName="Replace String" TypeName="ReplaceString" /> <ns5:SetCellValue ColumnType="Number" IsValid="True" ColNumber="1" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" NewValue="%replaceString1%" RowNumber="%RowNumber%" VariableName="%readFile1%" x:Name="setCellValue1" Description="Set a new value to a result set." DisplayName="Set Cell Value" TypeName="SetCellValue" /> <ns6:ConvertToPlainText Value="%readFile1%" IsValid="True" x:Name="convertToPlainText1" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" Description="Convert a ResultSet to plain text." DisplayName="Convert to Plain Text" TypeName="ConvertToPlainText" /> <ns7:WriteFile IsValid="True" x:Name="writeFile1" HostName="LocalHost" TimeInSeconds="0" NewValue="%convertToPlainText1%" Timeout="00:01:00" DisplayName="Write File" Path="/etc/ssh/sshd_config" IsAppend="False" Password="" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" Description="Write text to a file" HostId="1" TypeName="WriteFile" UserName="" /> <ns8:SendEmail Channel="0" TimeInSeconds="0" Subject="Root SSH login has been disabled" DestinationNumber="1" x:Name="sendEmail1" TemplateNumber="0" ShiftLevel="" IsValid="True" HostId="-2" TemplateName="{x:Null}" TypeName="SendEmail" SendRN="False" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" DestinationTypeCc="User" DestinationType="User" HostName="{x:Null}" Timeout="00:00:00" DisplayName="Send Email" Attachments="" Cc="" Description="Send an email to a user, a group or a duty."
